name: Gatecrasher
description:
Gatecrasher is a game for the Playdate.

As a player of this game you will control a ship. You'll use the crank to rotate the ship; turning the crank clockwise will rotate your ship clockwise, and turning the crank anti-clockwise will rotate your ship anti-clockwise, because doing it the other way round wouldn't make sense. You must navigate your ship through gates without crashing into them. 

I realise while writing this that the name of the game may be misleading, as the objective of the game is to not crash into the gates. I apologise for this, and those responsible have been fired.

Gatecrasher is also available on iOS and Android.
